英文公告.機關名稱: Taipei Economic and Cultural Office in Chicago
英文公告.機關地址: Two Prudential Plaza 57&58 floor, 180 North Stetson Avenue, Chicago, IL 60601
英文公告.標案名稱: Request for Proposals for Real Estate Broker Services
英文公告.廠商地址: 191 North Wacker Drive, Suite 2700, Chicago, IL 60606
英文公告.附加說明: SCOPE OF SERVICESThe successful firm shall agree to contract with the TECO in Chicago to provide the following:* Services required involve performing market analysis,* Developing strategies for purchase of property,* Negotiating with sellers on behalf of the TECO in Chicago,* Coordinating real estate appraisals,* Coordinating real estate transaction closings, and* Handling all other customary activities and services associated with real estate transactions.Services may include consultation with staffs of TECO in Chicago relating to the purchase of property. Presentations at related meetings may be required.BROKER'S QUALIFICATIONSRespondents to this RFP shall have the following qualifications:* Must be licensed and in good standing with the State of Illinois.* Must have an excellent reputation in the real estate community.* Must be knowledgeable in the local real estate market and have experience with small and large commercial properties.* Must be knowledgeable in the use of all public real estate records.All the respondents must remain current and not be in default of my obligations due the State of Illinois including, but not limited to, the payment of taxes, fines, penalties, licenses or other monies due to the State of Illinois.Any questions regarding this Request for proposals should be directed to Mr. Stan Mak (Tel: 312-6160100 ext.337) or e-mailed to stanmak@tecochicago.org
